ValidationRule.description: Ensures that if user chose an UI Type of Multi-Select Picklist,, Subquery Source cannot be empty.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Setup.cgcloud__Validation_Rules_Setting__c.cgcloud__Bypass_Validation__c = FALSE, ISPICKVAL( cgcloud__UI_Type__c , 'Multi-Select Picklist'), ISBLANK( cgcloud__Sub_Query_Source__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Multi Select Picklist needs a valid subquery source to populate its data.
